name: Gaia's Blessing
description:
Gaia's Blessing is a short (1-2 hour per playthrough) casual deck building farming simulator with hundred of cards for you to discover and use.

Plan, Plant, and Profit
Use seed cards to start planting your crops, take care of it with various abilities cards, and harvest once fully grown to be sold for money! Spend your hard earned money to gain more cards with powerful abilities, and create a deck of your dream!
